name: Ring of the Wayfarer
effect:
:ongoing: For this Combat, your selected [unit](../units/index.md) gains +1 :initiative:.

— OR —

:instant: At start of Combat with [Neutral Units](../units/index.md) put :paralysis: token on any [unit](../units/index.md) except :azure:.
flavor_text: Visiting a local wise man, you explain the intent of your journey. He reaches into a sack and withdraws a strange ring which he hands to you.
